sections.changelog:
2.3.0 - 5th January 2026

  • New: Added Google Sheets integration.
  • New: Added MailerPress integration.
  • New: Added Keap integration.
  • New: Added Zoho CRM integration.
  • New: Added password-based form restriction.
  • Improvement: Added placeholder support across all fields.
  • Improvement: Added option to block past dates in the date picker field.
  • Improvement: Improved handling of rotating banners in email summaries.

2.2.0 - 16th December 2025

  • New: Introduced Save and Progress feature.
  • New: Added form restriction options based on IP, country, keywords, and user login.
  • New: Added Conditional Logic support for Native Integrations.
  • Improvement: Added time picker support in Repeater.
  • Improvement: Display option labels instead of values in workflow multi-select fields.
  • Improvement: Added hidden field values to the single entry view.
  • Improvement: Updated calculation output to auto-append trailing zeros when rounding is greater than 0.
  • Improvement: Optimized script loading to improve speed and efficiency.
  • Fix: Corrected default operator for date and time picker blocks in conditional logic.
  • Fix: Fixed UI issue with date picker when using the Etch theme.
  • Fix: Fixed page break buttons not working inside Elementor popups.
  • Fix: Fixed input mask not applying to text fields inside Repeater.

2.1.0 - 2nd December 2025

  • New: Added HubSpot integration.
  • New: Added MailPoet integration.
  • New: WP Fusion (3.47.3) integrates with SureForms.
  • Fix: Ensured compatibility with WordPress 6.9.
  • Fix: Entries files not getting deleted on deleting entries.

2.0.0 - 20th November 2025

  • Improvement: Revamped the SureForms UI.

1.13.2 - 7th November 2025

  • Fix: Fixed the Upload field validation issues.

1.13.1 - 24th October 2025

  • Fix: Fixed missing Webhooks integration settings.
  • Fix: Fixed required field issue in Kit and MailerLite integration.

1.13.0 - 14th October 2025

  • New: Introduced Native Integrations.

1.12.3 - 30th September 2025

  • Fix: Fixed error on form submission when upload field is left empty.
  • Fix: Form saving/publishing failed due to SureForms meta error.
  • Fix: Forms not publishing or saving with certain blocks on low PHP memory servers.

1.12.2 - 26th September 2025

  • Improvement: Enhanced admin permission check.
  • Improvement: Enhanced file upload type handling.
  • Fix: Resolved row gap issue in confirm email field inside Repeater field.

1.12.1 - 18th September 2025

  • Improvement: Added support of dropdown, phone number, URL, and date picker in repeater field.
  • Fix: Fixed issue preventing ZIP file uploads on Windows.

1.12.0 - 4th September 2025

  • New: Introduced Custom HTML field.
  • Fix: Fixed extra padding and double scroll issue when editing entries for forms with multiple fields.
  • Fix: Removed RAR file type support from upload fields.

1.11.0 - 2nd September 2025

  • New: Introduced Repeater field.
  • Fix: Submit button disable option no longer resets on refresh.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where the date picker dropdown and page break button overlapped when BeTheme was active.

1.10.1 - 19th August 2025

  • New: Introduced Conditional Logic for Email Notification.
  • Improvement: Added a button to clear the minimum and maximum date values for the date picker block.
  • Improvement: Made the signature image viewable instead of displaying a "View" button.
  • Fix: Resolved a runtime error when all options were deleted from a text slider in the Editor.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where error messages in form validation were not saving due to duplicate keys.
  • Fix: Webhook-selected fields were not saving in trigger conditions.

1.10.0 - 7th August 2025

  • New: Introduced CPT Creation in the Business Plan.
  • Fix: File types were not being uploaded even when allowed in the Upload field.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where conditional logic was not preserved for duplicated blocks.
  • Fix: Resolved the nonce verification error with the auto-login feature.

1.9.0 - 22nd July 2025

  • New: Introduced PDF Generation.
  • Improvement: Updated OttoKit session ID cookie logic to set the cookie only for forms using the Custom App OttoKit feature.

1.8.0 - 10th July 2025

  • New: Introduced User Registration and Login.
  • New: Added Password field, integrated with Login and Register fields.
  • Improvement: Added license popup for AI Form Builder when license is inactive.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue with conditional logic popup displaying the entire HTML element when a link is added to a block label.
  • Fix: Addressed accessibility issues related to required field announcements.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue with functionality for text-type slider.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where the calculations dropdown in the editor sidebar was not visible.

1.7.3 - 26th June 2025

  • Fix: Fixed conditional logic popup formatting issues when selecting date or time fields.
  • Fix: Addressed issues related to conditional logic not working correctly with hidden fields.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where the form confirmation settings screen appeared blank after saving.

1.7.2 - 12th June 2025

  • Fix: Resolved an issue where changes to custom app settings were not being saved correctly in the OttoKit response configuration.
  • Fix: Resolved an overflow issue in conditional logic popup inputs by adding ellipsis for long options.

1.7.1 - 9th June 2025

  • Improvement: Enhanced resend email notification popup with informative messaging when no notifications are configured.
  • Fix: Addressed UI inconsistencies in the conditional logic editor for Multi Choice and Dropdown fields.

1.7.0 - 22nd May 2025

  • New: Revamped user interface for Dashboard and Settings with a more modern and intuitive experience.
  • New: Added box shadow customization for input fields.
  • Improvement: Slider Block now supports decimal step values (e.g., 0.1+).
  • Fix: Added support for .mov and .txt file uploads by correctly handling their MIME types (video/quicktime, text/plain).

1.6.3 - 14th May 2025

  • New: Introduced Advanced Form Styling.
  • Improvement: Enhanced Date Picker field to support manual text input in addition to the calendar picker.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where conditional logic failed for number fields containing commas (e.g., “1,000”).

1.6.2 - 29th April 2025

  • New: Added more options for conditional logic.
  • Fix: Fixed calculation issues in multi-step forms caused by label formatting.

1.6.1 - 23rd April 2025

  • Improvement: Added entry logs for enabled webhooks.

1.6.0 - 16th April 2025

  • New: Added Digital Signature block in Pro Plan.
  • Improvement: Custom App – Added option to adjust response wait time with the server.

1.5.0 - 9th April 2025

  • New: Added support for Calculators in Business Plan.
  • New: Added “Show Value” support for Multi-choice and Dropdown fields.
  • New: Added prefix and suffix support to the Slider field.
  • New: Added functionality to hide the Submit button.
  • Improvement: SureTriggers is rebranded to OttoKit, added compatibility changes for a smooth transition.
  • Fix: Resolved functional bugs in conditional logic.

1.4.3 - 27th March 2025

  • Fix: Required field validation no longer triggers for hidden address fields in conditional logic.
  • Fix: Addressed a security bug. Props to Dmitrii Ignatyev for privately reporting it.

1.4.2 - 18th March 2025

  • Fix: Resolved a compatibility issue with SureTriggers where the response data type was not working correctly with the Custom App feature.

1.4.1 - 4th March 2025

  • Fix: Resolved an issue where selected Multiple Choice field values were not displayed correctly in entries if they contained commas.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where dropdown conditional logic broke on the front end when SureForms was embedded in Bricks Builder.
  • Fix: Pressing SHIFT + ENTER now correctly triggers form validation instead of skipping it.

1.4.0 - 12th February 2025

  • New: Introduced Conversational Forms.
  • Fix: Addressed an issue where the default value was not reflected in the Rating block.
  • Fix: Fixed an issue where the time picker dropdown would collapse when the scrollbar was clicked.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where the Custom App was not displaying results despite receiving a response from SureTriggers.

1.3.1 - 28th January 2025

  • Fix: Corrected the spelling of "SureForms" in field descriptions.

1.3.0 - 21st January 2025

  • New: Added a feature to edit entries.
  • New: Added an option to resend email notifications for one and multiple entries.
  • New: Added a feature to add entry notes.
  • Improvement: Added pagination and delete action to the entry logs interface.
  • Improvement: Updated CSS class names for conditional logic to resolve conflicts with generic class names like show and hide for improving code readability and compatibility.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue where conditional logic failed to trigger with GET parameters on page load.

1.2.4 - 7th January 2025

  • New: Added translations for the Italian, Portuguese, and Polish languages.

1.2.3- 31st December 2024

  • New: Added translations for the Spanish, German, French, and Dutch languages.

1.2.2 - 24th December 2024

  • New: Added conditional logic feature to webhooks for providing more flexibility in your workflows.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue with conditional logic in the Multiple Choice field to ensure it functions as expected.

1.2.1 - 17th December 2024

  • Improvement: Enhanced screen reader announcements for validation messages.
  • Improvement: Added keyboard navigation compatibility for the Rating block.
  • Improvement: Improved screen reader accessibility to announce block labels and help text on tab navigation.
  • Improvement: Made global validation messages dynamic for better adaptability.
  • Improvement: Added translation compatibility for validation message input labels in admin settings.
  • Improvement: Refined PHP logic to prevent multiple dots and spaces in the Upload field file types.
  • Fix: Fixed update notification issue when SureMembers is installed.

1.2.0 - 11th December 2024

  • New: Added Zapier integration.
  • Fix: Addressed an UI issue where the filenames in the Custom App responses were displayed incorrectly if they exceeded the character limit.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue in the Custom App where the response loader text didn't display correctly on the first load.

1.1.1 - 5th December 2024

  • Improvement: Optimized license validation queries to enhance admin loading times.
  • Fix: Corrected an issue with conditional logic in the Phone Number field.
  • Fix: Resolved an issue in the Custom App where HTML attributes were not rendering correctly in responses.
  • Fix: Fixed an issue where settings pages were hidden when the plugin title was translated.

1.1.0 - 28th November 2024

  • New: Custom App - Added support for downloading multiple files received in the SureTriggers response.
  • New: Custom App - Added a setting to change the response generation in progress text.
  • New: Custom App - Added a progress loader to indicate the percentage completion of the response being generated by SureTriggers.
  • New: Custom App - Added settings to display the response below the form or on the Confirmation page.
  • New: Custom App - Added settings to show or hide the Copy Text and Download All buttons for the displayed response.
  • Improvement: Enhanced page break functionality to announce the current page number.

1.0.5 - 19th November 2024

  • Improvement: Optimized accessibility for the Date Picker field.
  • Improvement: Added translation support for hardcoded UI text to improve localization.
  • Improvement: Enhanced dynamic height adjustment for conditional logic in multichoice field.
  • Fix: Corrected RTL alignment for all blocks.

1.0.4 - 12th November 2024

  • Fix: Ensured compatibility with WordPress 6.7.

1.0.3 - 6th November 2024

  • Improvement: Tab navigation for the Time Picker field.
  • Improvement: Optimized screen reader announcements for field labels, required status and descriptions.

1.0.2 - 31st October 2024

  • New: Custom App feature added in Business – Alpha release.
  • Improvement: Bulk edit options added for the slider field.

1.0.1 - 24th October 2024

  • Improvement: Added 'Enter key' support to add options in text-type slider field.
  • Fix: Hidden required fields in conditional logic no longer block form submission.
  • Fix: Added support for conditional logic in text slider field.

1.0.0 - 22nd October 2024

  • Initial release
